00043 //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00044 //-   mesh.h - definitions for mesh handling
00045 //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00046 #define MAXMESHFAN          (512*512) // Terrain mesh size
00047 #define MAXMESHCOMMAND           4    // Draw up to 4 fans
00048 #define MAXMESHSIZEY          1024    // Max fans in y direction
00049 #define MAXMESHTYPE             64    // Number of fansquare command types
00050 #define MAXMESHCOMMANDENTRIES   32    // Fansquare command list size
00051 #define MAXMESHVERTICES         16    // Fansquare vertices
00052 #define BYTESFOREACHVERTEX      (3*sizeof(float) + 3*sizeof(Uint8) + 3*sizeof(float))
00053 
00054 #define MAXTILETYPE          (64*4)   // Max number of tile images
00055 #define TX_FUDGE              0.5f
00056 
00057 
00058 //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00059 //-   Mesh FX bits
00060 //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00061 enum e_mpd_fx
00062 {
00063     MESHFX_REF     =       0,  // 0 This tile is drawn 1st
00064     MESHFX_SHA     = (1 << 0), // 0 This tile is drawn 2nd
00065     MESHFX_DRAWREF = (1 << 1), // 1 Draw reflection of characters
00066     MESHFX_ANIM    = (1 << 2), // 2 Animated tile ( 4 frame )
00067     MESHFX_WATER   = (1 << 3), // 3 Render water above surface ( Water details are set per module )
00068     MESHFX_WALL    = (1 << 4), // 4 Wall ( Passable by ghosts, particles )
00069     MESHFX_IMPASS  = (1 << 5), // 5 Impassable
00070     MESHFX_DAMAGE  = (1 << 6), // 6 Damage
00071     MESHFX_SLIPPY  = (1 << 7)  // 7 Ice or normal
00072 };
00073 
00074 
00075 //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00076 //-   Fan / tile types
00077 //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00078 enum e_fan_type
00079 {
00080     TTYPE_TWO_FACED_GROUND1  =  0,
00081     TTYPE_TWO_FACED_GROUND2  =  1,
00082     TTYPE_FOUR_FACED_GROUND  =  2,
00083     TTYPE_EIGHT_FACED_GROUND =  3,
00084     TTYPE_PILLER_TEN         =  4,
00085     TTYPE_PILLER_EIGHTEEN    =  5,
00086     TTYPE_WALL_SIX_WE        =  9,
00087     TTYPE_WALL_SIX_NS        = 10,
00088     TTYPE_WALL_EIGHT_W       = 13,
00089     TTYPE_WALL_EIGHT_N       = 14,
00090     TTYPE_WALL_EIGHT_E       = 15,
00091     TTYPE_WALL_EIGHT_S       = 16,
00092     TTYPE_WALL_TEN_WS        = 17,
00093     TTYPE_WALL_TEN_NW        = 18,
00094     TTYPE_WALL_TEN_NE        = 19,
00095     TTYPE_WALL_TEN_ES        = 20,
00096     TTYPE_WALL_TWELVE_WSE    = 21,
00097     TTYPE_WALL_TWELVE_NWS    = 22,
00098     TTYPE_WALL_TWELVE_ENW    = 23,
00099     TTYPE_WALL_TWELVE_SEN    = 24,
00100     TTYPE_STAIR_TWELVE_WE    = 25,
00101     TTYPE_STAIR_TWELVE_NS    = 26
00102 };

00127 //---------------------------------------------------------------------

00130 class c_object
00131 {
00132     private:
00133         string name;    // the name, like object.obj
00134         bool gor;       // Is it in the Global Object Repository?
00135         int slot;       // The slot number
00136         GLuint icon[1]; // The icon texture
00137 
00138     public:
00139         c_object();
00140         ~c_object();
00141 
00142         string get_name()              { return this->name; }
00143         void   set_name(string p_name) { this->name = p_name; }
00144 
00145         bool   get_gor()           { return this->gor; }
00146         void   set_gor(bool p_gor) { this->gor = p_gor; }
00147 
00148         int    get_slot()           { return this->slot; }
00149         void   set_slot(int p_slot) { this->slot = p_slot; }
00150 
00151         GLuint get_icon()            { return this->icon[0]; }
00152         GLuint *get_icon_array()     { return this->icon; }
00153         void set_icon(GLuint p_icon) { this->icon[0] = p_icon; }
00154 
00155         bool read_data_file(string);
00156         bool render();
00157         void debug_data();
00158 };

00281 {

00287 
00288         Uint8   vrt_count;                  
00289         Uint8   ref[MAXMESHVERTICES];

00291 
00292 //      c_tile_definition();
00293 //      ~c_tile_definition()
00294 };

00296 
00297 //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00300 //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00301 struct c_tile_dictionary : public vector<c_tile_definition>
00302 {
00303     typedef vector<c_tile_definition> my_vector; 
00304 
00305     TILE_TXBOX TxBox[MAXTILETYPE]; 
00306 
00309     my_vector & getData() { return *(static_cast<my_vector*>(this)); }
00310 
00311     bool load();
00312 };

00334         Uint32  Tile_X[MAXMESHSIZEY];       // Which fan to start a row with

00502 // TODO: Does it really make sense to make those private?
00503 class c_passage
00504 {
00505     private:
00506         unsigned int id;
00507         string name;
00508         vect2 pos_top;
00509         vect2 pos_bot;
00510         bool open;
00511         bool shoot_through;
00512         bool slippy_close;
00513 
00514     public:
00515         unsigned int get_id()                  { return this->id; }
00516         void         set_id(unsigned int p_id) { this->id = p_id; }
00517 
00518         string get_name()              { return this->name; }
00519         void   set_name(string p_name) { this->name = p_name; }
00520 
00521         vect2 get_pos_top()                { return this->pos_top; }
00522         void  set_pos_top(vect2 p_pos_top) { this->pos_top = p_pos_top; }
00523 
00524         vect2 get_pos_bot()                { return this->pos_bot; }
00525         void  set_pos_bot(vect2 p_pos_bot) { this->pos_bot = p_pos_bot; }
00526 
00527         bool get_open()            { return this->open; }
00528         void set_open(bool p_open) { this->open = p_open; }
00529 
00530         bool get_shoot_through()                     { return this->shoot_through; }
00531         void set_shoot_through(bool p_shoot_through) { this->shoot_through = p_shoot_through; }
00532 
00533         bool get_slippy_close()                    { return this->slippy_close; }
00534         void set_slippy_close(bool p_slippy_close) { this->slippy_close = p_slippy_close; }
00535 
00536     c_passage()
00537     {
00538         this->id            = 0;
00539         this->name          = "";
00540         this->pos_top.x     = 0;
00541         this->pos_top.y     = 0;
00542         this->pos_bot.x     = 0;
00543         this->pos_bot.y     = 0;
00544         this->open          = false;
00545         this->shoot_through = false;
00546         this->slippy_close  = false;
00547     }
00548 };
